document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">help </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">our </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e07c84">Bleaker </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#eca078">Parts </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">Salubrious </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">Hours </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">are </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">given </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Which </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">if </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">they </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">do </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#eca078">fit </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f0ac5c">Earth </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">Drill </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">silently </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">for </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f0ac5c">Heaven </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: To help our bleaker parts
